articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for London, United Kingdom.

Canada Reception Centre
190 Clear Skies Private

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:30 a.m.

London, United Kingdom

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in London, United Kingdom.

Inflite Jet Centre
London Stansted Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
